lines.text:
[knock at the door]
That's her, that's the dog
Dogs don't knock, Floyd.
People in California generally swallow before they start talking.

[Has banana in his mouth]
Hey. I know how to eat in California, okay?
[the Newtons are having dinner, faint barking sounds are heard]
Are those sounds coming from outside or in the basement?

[quickly, in unison]
Outside.

[leaves the table]
I-I think I'm hearing something from the basement.
[George walks down the basement, the light switch is heard turned on]
OH, NO!
Roll, anyone?
If you want your dog back, call my lawyer.
So, can I get you a Coke?
Aren't I a little tall for you? I mean, aren't you a little short?
Well, height's just temporary. When you wake up in the morning, you're a little taller, right?
No. See ya.
[Janie leaves as Ted goes upset]
We're not millionaires yet. Are we thousandaires?
Honey, I've been thinking. You been thinking?
Uh-huh.
What have you been thinking?
I've been thinking, "What do you think?"
I've got good news.
Yeah, what's that?
The judge threw out Regina's claim. That means I get Missy and Regina gets nothing.
That's great, Brillo.
I bought Missy over to see her children. Are they around?
Sure I'll get them. Puppies! Puppies, your mother is here.
Puppies! Oh, puppies!
[Missy's puppies come running down the stairs]
Ryce? Like the food?

[to Floyd]
Do you have to stand like that? Didn't my trainer teach you how to stand? How can we have a relationship if you can't even stand right?
Isn't this entertaining? Hicks and their dogs.
I just got off the phone with Miss Anderson. You wanna tell me what's going on?
I can't.
You can't? Oh, honey, yes you can. We've always been very honest with each other. What, are you skipping school to spend time with boys? 'Cause if you are, there was a time in my life ...
No, mom, no. I'm not using drugs and I'm not pregnant.
Well, what's goin' on, honey?
Ted, Emily, and I have been hiding four puppies in the basement.

[downstairs]
Honey, I'm home!
Don't tell your dad.
[Regina and Floyd fall into a pool of mud from Beethoven]
Hold on!
Ugh, shut up! And don't do us any favors! Take your stinkin' puppies and stuff it!
Yeah, stuff it!
Shut up!
We're going to help you and it will be alright!

[to Floyd]
You idiot!
What, me? This whole dog business was YOUR idea!
My idea?
[the dam comes apart spilling mud and Regina and Floyd into the raging river]

[to Floyd]
I HATE YOU!
You stupid! You got me into this! It's all your fault!
No, it's not!
I didn't even care about those dogs!
Let go of me!

[to George]
Well... ya hungry?

[after Taylor locked her in with him]
Taylor, this isn't funny. Just unlock the door.
Ryce, Ryce, relax. This is gonna be an experience you're never gonna forget.
[Beethoven suddenly tears the cottage down sending half the party of teenagers and Taylor into the lake]
Hey, Taylor, great party!
[Beethoven barks at her]
Thanks, Beethoven!
[the Newton family search for the puppies]
Look!
[the family stops]
Puppy poops.
If it's warm, that means we're close! Touch it.
No, YOU touch it.
No, I'm not gonna touch it; you're gonna touch it.
I'll touch it.
[Ryce slowly puts her fingers down to the object, Emily winces]

[in disgust]
It's warm.
Okay, good! They're close. Better wash your hands.
[Ryce sees Taylor talking to another girl]
Ah, forget her. He like you, he told me.
[they see the girl Taylor is talking to again]
God, you can see her bra right through her shirt. Like totally accidental, I'm sure.
I don't want to be responsible for 5 dogs!

You don't HAVE to be responsible. Dad, we've been responsible - we've gone through hell with these dogs. And if being responsible means we have to give them up now, then, I hate responsibility. Dad, we kept them alive just like you and mom kept us alive. Ad you're not gonna take them away from us.
[Regina snatches the puppies from Ted and Emily]
'$11 for chocolate bars', huh?
[first lines]

[gives Beethoven a piece of pork]
Here, Beethoven.

[gives him a slightly bigger slice]
Here, boy. Here's a special treat.

[shows him a roasted chicken]
Here, Beethoven. This is from all of us.
Beethoven...
[holds up a giant steak]
I want you to have this!
[George approaches to Beethoven]
Mom, we're out of toilet paper!
Here!
[a roll of toilet paper wakes up Beethoven from his dream]
[after Ryce comes home and after Taylor kissed her]
Hi, honey.

[smiles, not paying attention]
Uh-huh...
Uh-huh...
Hey, Mr. Newton!
[George puts down his mug of coffee]

[gets ready]
Okay, Jordan, right down the pike.
[the newspaper boy tosses the paper accidentally knocking down a hanging flower and spilling dirt all over George]
Sorry...
[George goes still until]
ALICE!
Do you wanna get your face crushed, shrimp?
Last one, I promise.
[to Beethoven]
Beethoven, Bite this guy in the Weiner.
[Beethoven barks and growls, causing the bully to run]
